level.heading: Attachment, garnishment, and levy of execution.
level.text: During the pendency in this, or any other state, of a liquidation proceeding, whether called by that name or not, no action or proceeding in the nature of an attachment, garnishment, or levy of execution shall be commenced or maintained in the District against the delinquent insurer or its assets.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For legislative history of D.C. Law 10-35, see Historical and Statutory Notes following ยง 31-1301.
